description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is requesting a Regional Individual Standing Offer for dredging services for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) in Prince Edward Island. The standing offer will be for 1 year.
full_summary:
================ीं==

### Floating Plant Dredging Standing Offer

#### Procurement Notice

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFO) for a Regional Individual Standing Offer to address maintenance dredging issues in the Prince Edward Island region.

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4442591725-Doc4455421964
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4442591725
* **Publication Date**: February 26, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 12, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

#### Description of Work

The successful bidder will provide maintenance dredging services as and when required at various public wharves and entrance channels located within Prince Edward Island. The scope of work includes provision of all labour and equipment necessary to perform dredging as outlined in the specifications.

#### Notice URL

* English: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18906125?extsite=MTg5MDYxMjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* French: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18906125?extsite=MTg5MDYxMjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

#### Categories and Trade Agreements

* **UNSPSC**: 72141206 – Dredging services
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Eligibility and Assessment Criteria

Eligibility and assessment criteria are outlined in the solicitation document. Interested bidders are advised to carefully review the terms and conditions before submitting a bid.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Kate Mintzer, PSPC (she/her)
* **Email**: [kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
